review:
I am from Bangalore and I have placed order on SUNDAY ,within 1 day (MONDAY )
. Afternoon i got a call for confirmation and get installed in the afternoon .
Thanks seller ,  
and also got 1 Month Tamil plan ,  
This set-top box gives 1080i you need to change it to 1080p for better quality  
And i have made many call to Airtel DTH , they are very responsive , when
comparing other DTH services like SUN DIRECT AND DISH TV , they charge min
Rs.190/- per month for basic plan , But airtel give you Rs.160/- per month for
Basic Plan ,  
Advantage:  
1.After power on the airtel set-top box With in a 30 Sec you can start
changing channel , but other DTH service they wont allow for 1 min.  
  
Disadvantage  
1.You cant change language on Discovery Channel , History TV etc..  
2.Set-top UI (Software) Not good enough because its not User friendly as like
SUN DIRECT .

The signal strength is aweful .. The installation guy charged Rs 150... I have
called him up to inform him that the signal strength is not good to which he
had asked me to check the signal strength online and said that he will come
and check but hasn't come back.. I am posting images of the picture quality
taken moments ago..

On time delivery done product is very good

Quick installation no extra charge, DTH clarity super in HD, two USB
connection, latest stb

There was a slight delay in installation and that is why it got 4 stars from
me. I can understand the lack of service centre in our village/town but that
doesn't mean the unwanted desire to improve the overall services.

5 stars to the DTH India seller. I placed the order in the morning at 10 AM
and by same day 3 PM all installation was done.  
  
The only thing that I complain about is, the person who came for installation
asked Rs150 extra for 2 connectors (2 connectors comes with the package. In my
case there was need of 4). I only assume that the cost of connectors should
not be that much.  
  
However 5 stars for the service.

Free Standard Installation (If It Requires Any Other Accessory Like Connector,
Booster, Bracket, Etc. Which Is Not A Part Of Standard Installation, Then You
Will Have To Pay Separately)  
  
The above statement is there in the description but the installation guy asked
for 300 bugs for installation.  
  
He gave 10M cable and said 10 rupees per meter which should be 100 Rupees.  
  
I need explanation on this.

the box was received and installed by the service technician as promised and
everything went well. However the plan that was promised along with the
package was only active for 1 week and not 1 month. Tried calling customer
service, but they were not able to give me any kind of assistance. All that i
heard was , you have to recharge to continue viewing the services.  
  
That is pretty disappointing, otherwise all fine.

Very good service by the seller and installation also done well. No issue with
this seller and as well as with Amazon.in.  
Five Star Rating for Five reasons  
1\. Super Fast Delivery by the dealer within 4Hrs  
2\. Purchased for a good deal  
3\. No Extra Installation Charges  
4\. Good Support Staff from Airtel Customer Care  
5\. Picture Clarity was awesome

Dear all I received it on 26/11/2017 as per the courier update. The nearest
local AIRTEL DTH provider came and installed at free of cost. I am happy with
the product and service. The image given I think is old one. I received the
latest HD set top box with HD Dish antenna. It comes with preloaded  
HD package. The system got activated in less than 2 hours.

review:
Extremely Fast delivery I have ordered in morning and the dish was fixed in
noon at the same day in just three hours my order is completed.

\- Delivered in 3 days  
  
\- Installation done in 45 mins  
  
\- Good Picture Quality  
  
\- Less HD Channels also to be paid extra for HD channels / Costlier than
other DTH in terms of channels availability.
